Apesar da quantidade de jogadores toxicos, é bom jogar com os amigos!

Played CSGO since 1.6 and enjoyed the game game since then! I love the competetive feeling and the tactic of the game
BUT something has change with the community and the players. In my earlier days me and my friends had a good time playing cs 1.6, cs source - the game was fun and encouraged fast play. Today there is a toxic community, people get kicked out of sessions of no reason, bad griefing, cheaters, cheaters, and cheaters....
I cant understand why there is no Anticheat enabled while playing?

I´ve alreday tried Faceit and the old feeling of playing felt good again... Please find something to kill the toxic gameplay which is standard nowadays on Steam.
You are going to loose players if you dont do anything about this...

Best regards!

Really fun and one of the only shooters I have actually played for more than a day. Hackers can be annoying but also funny sometimes and it is a good game to just hop on with the boys. Bhopping and surfing is also fun too which gives a little break from shooting. Banger!
